This is a place holder for creating and updating standard operational procedures but not limited to any technical documentation. The pages are indexed so that it can be searched in future.

Dokuwiki has a syntax that helps you format the documentation and codes when required. More documentation on this can be found here. Formatting Syntax

Please add all documentation under 'san' namespace. The apache and dokuwiki is shared with the Unix team documentation.
